sources.styles.sass:
$main-purple: #a285dc
$main-purple-d: #6437BE
$main-yellow: #ebab24
$main-yellow-d: #BB8511
$main-violet: #5954e5
$dark-main-violet:#302ADF
$main-green: #9dd052
$main-green-d: #669027
$main-red: #ea5d4f
$main-red-d: #C92618
$asc-blue: #51c1e9
$light-asc-blue: #A4DFF4
$dark-asc-blue: #147DA3
$main-dark: #121212
$misc-dark: #3c4043
$misc-dark-d: #303336

@import 'https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Ubuntu&display=swap'
// font-family: 'Ubuntu', sans-serif;

@mixin overlay($percentage)
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, $percentage)

@mixin pseudo-overlay()
  content: ''
  top: 0
  left: 0
  height: 100%
  width: 100%
  position: absolute

@mixin shadow()
  box-shadow: -1px 10px 10px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.56)

html
  background-color: $main-dark
  color: #fff

.title
  color: $light-asc-blue
  font-weight: bold
  font-family: 'Ubuntu', sans-serif
  transition: all 1s linear
  text-shadow:  1px 1px $dark-asc-blue, 2px 2px $dark-asc-blue, 3px 3px $dark-asc-blue

.title:hover
  text-shadow:  1px 1px $dark-asc-blue, 2px 2px $dark-asc-blue, 3px 3px $dark-asc-blue, 4px 4px $dark-asc-blue, 5px 5px $dark-asc-blue, 6px 6px $dark-asc-blue, 7px 7px $dark-asc-blue

h2
  margin: 0

// Card styling
.sched-item
  @include shadow()
  color: #fff
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12) !important
  border-radius: 35px

.card-title
  font-family: 'Ubuntu', sans-serif
  font-weight: bold !important
  font-size: 26px

.card-content > p
  font-size: 22px
  color: #FFFF70

.card-action
  border-bottom-left-radius: 35px !important
  border-bottom-right-radius: 35px !important
  font-size: 17px
  text-decoration: underline
  min-height: 58px

.hidden
  display: none

.sched-card
  margin-bottom: 5px !important

li
  margin-bottom: 10px

// Schedule Block Coloring, the -d at the end of some classes just stands for "dark"
.bg-asc-blue
  background-color: $asc-blue !important

.bg-asc-blue-d
  background-color: $dark-asc-blue !important

.bg-violet
  background-color: $main-violet !important

.bg-violet-d
  background-color: $dark-main-violet !important

.bg-dark
  background-color: $misc-dark !important

.bg-dark-d
  background-color: $misc-dark-d !important

.bg-purple
  background-color: $main-purple !important

.bg-purple-d
  background-color: $main-purple-d !important

.bg-yellow
  background-color: $main-yellow !important

.bg-yellow-d
  background-color: $main-yellow-d !important

.bg-green
  background-color: $main-green !important

.bg-green-d
  background-color: $main-green-d !important

.bg-red
  background-color: $main-red !important

.bg-red-d
  background-color: $main-red-d !important

// Collapsible element styling
.collapsible
  @include shadow()

.collapsible, .collapsible-header, .collapsible-body
  border: none

.collapsible-header
  background-color: $main-dark
  position: relative

.collapsible-body
  position: relative
  background-color: $main-dark

.collapsible-body::before
  @include overlay(0.08)
  @include pseudo-overlay()

.collapsible-header::before
  @include overlay(0.12)
  @include pseudo-overlay()

.keyboard-focused .collapsible-header:focus
  background-color: $main-dark !important

#titleAsterik
  height: 75px
  width: 75px
  position: relative
